page.title: 07A DAY IN THE LIFE OF MARIE
page.content: As a waitress I serve the tourists tea, cakes, pancakes, snacks, etc., then clear and re-lay the tables. We try to get everyone out by 6 o'clock so that we can brush and hoover the floor. For all this I earn Â£40 per week plus tips. After work on a Saturday I go home, have a shower and go into Banchory with three of my friends. We go to the Douglas Arms Hotel where we sit and speak to our friends while drinking { {Coca-Cola}until midnight. I usually get a taxi home but sometimes my mother comes to collect me. Although I enjoy Saturday nights, Friday nights are better as we go to a local discotheque which is always great fun as we all enjoy dancing.
